# AxelarAuthWeight

```
npx hardhat run scripts/deployAxelarAuthWeighted.js --network sepolia

Deploying the contracts with the account: 0x130C4810D57140e1E62967cBF742CaEaE91b6ecE
Account balance: 94606615445690688

AxelarAuthWeighted deployed to: 0xfFCEAD726633fDdb66d30659DefFCA56Eb753896
Current epoch: BigNumber { value: "1" }
Hash for epoch 0xe81a752b3aa3052ed6c930cfc582d75925467b1cac0317cb04c4d2a107f08309
```

# AxelarGateway

```
npx hardhat run scripts/deployAxelarGateway.js --network sepolia

Deploying the contracts with the account: 0x130C4810D57140e1E62967cBF742CaEaE91b6ecE
Account balance: 89211823980601284

```
